医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
消除肺功能测试中的种族调整可能会改变诊断和残疾资格哈佛医学院科学家领导的最新研究表明，从估计肺功能的方程中删除种族将改变患者群体中疾病严重程度的分类，使更多的黑人进入晚期疾病类别。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Elimination-race- adjustment-in-lung-function-tests-may-alter-diagnosis-and-disability-eligibility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Elimination-race- adjustment-in-lung-function-tests-may-alter-diagnosis-and-disability-eligibility.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c4aa81e1-15e6-4ab4-b234-d8b29b29e04a Mon, 20 May 2024 02:11:40 -0400 Eliminating race adjustment in lung function tests may alter diagnosis and disability eligibility
对乙酰氨基酚具有预防脓毒症患者急性呼吸窘迫综合征和器官损伤的潜力美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 支持的一项临床试验发现，静脉注射对乙酰氨基酚可降低败血症患者发生器官损伤或出现急性呼吸窘迫综合征的风险，急性呼吸窘迫综合征是一种导致液体渗漏到肺部的严重疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Acetaminophen-shows-pottial-in-preventing-acute-respiratory-distress-syndrome-organ-injury-in-sepsis-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Acetaminophen-shows-pottial-in-preventing-acute-respiratory-distress-syndrome-organ-injury-in-sepsis-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=130ab694-4937-4ad4-8976-f573803439f0 Mon, 20 May 2024 01:52:20 -0400 Acetaminophen shows potential in preventing acute respiratory distress syndrome, organ injury in sepsis patients
女性胃肠科医生与咨询后医疗保健使用率较低有关一项即将提交的研究显示，与男性胃肠病学家初次就诊的患者相比，女性胃肠病学家初次就诊的患者在就诊后两年内不太可能在急诊科、医院或初级保健办公室接受医疗护理2024 年消化系统疾病周。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Female-gastroenterologies-linked-to-lower-post-consultation-health-care-use.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Female-gastroenterologies-linked-to-lower-post-consultation-health-care-use.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f1175d2-ab10-46d6-8694-18a4496b5d59 Mon, 20 May 2024 01:32:19 -0400 Female gastroenterologists linked to lower post-consultation health care use
世卫组织更新细菌优先病原体清单以应对抗菌素耐药性世界卫生组织 (WHO) 今天发布了最新的 2024 年细菌优先病原体清单 (BPPL)，其中列出了 15 个抗生素耐药细菌家族，分为关键、高和中等类别，以进行优先排序。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/WHO-updates-Bacterial-Priority-Pathogens-List-to-combat-antimicrobial-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/WHO-updates-Bacterial-Priority-Pathogens-List-to-combat-antimicrobial-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=666ec68e-c8d2-4cd4-807f-58936d2f8b78 Mon, 20 May 2024 01:23:40 -0400 WHO updates Bacterial Priority Pathogens List to combat antimicrobial resistance
Insilico 和 NVIDIA 推出新的 LLM 转换器，用于解决生物和化学任务在一篇新论文中，临床阶段人工智能 (AI) 驱动的药物发现公司 Insilico Medicine（“Insilico”）的研究人员与 NVIDIA 合作，提出了一种新的大型语言模型 (LLM) 转换器，用于解决生物和化学任务，称为 nach0 。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Insilico-and-NVIDIA-unveil-new-LLM-transformer-for-solving-biological-and-chemical-tasks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Insilico-and-NVIDIA-unveil-new-LLM-transformer-for-solving-biological-and-chemical-tasks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a200c46e-31b7-4d84-b8a7-e0fdaaa0fbf7 Mon, 20 May 2024 01:16:00 -0400 Insilico and NVIDIA unveil new LLM transformer for solving biological and chemical tasks
癌症研究人员敦促拥抱人工智能以获得突破性的见解和效率《自然评论癌症》中的一篇评论强调癌症研究人员有必要了解人工智能的潜力和局限性，详细介绍其在癌症研究中的应用和挑战，以帮助非计算生物学家。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Cancer-researchers-urged-to-embrace-AI-for-groundwriting-insights-and-efficiency.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Cancer-researchers-urged-to-embrace-AI-for-groundwriting-insights-and-efficiency.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=69606157-5774-4386-a231-3ec09d3c804a Mon, 20 May 2024 00:08:00 -0400 Cancer researchers urged to embrace AI for groundbreaking insights and efficiency
研究称，体脂百分比在预测肥胖相关健康风险方面优于体重指数《临床内分泌与代谢杂志》上的一项研究发现，体脂百分比 (%BF) 阈值在预测与肥胖相关的健康状况方面比 BMI 更准确，这为定义超重和肥胖提出了新标准。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240519/Body-fat-percentage-beats-BMI-in-predicting-obesity-lated-health-risks-study-says.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240519/Body-fat-percentage-beats-BMI-in-predicting-obesity-lated-health-risks-study-says.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7dc6bf86-8c80-48be-a50e-9bfa1a7aa577 Sun, 19 May 2024 23:22:00 -0400 Body fat percentage beats BMI in predicting obesity-related health risks, study says
蟒蛇养殖会成为可持续畜牧生产的下一个重大事件吗？ 《科学报告》中的一项研究表明，蟒蛇养殖可能是一种可持续且高效的牲畜替代品，显示出可观的增长率和商业用途的高生产效率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240519/Could-python-farming-be-the-next-big-thing-in-sustainable-livestock-production.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240519/Could-python-farming-be-the-next-big-thing-in-sustainable-livestock-production.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=798a1a86-a044-4a4c-8a79-a1a832603d04 Sun, 19 May 2024 22:54:00 -0400 Could python farming be the next big thing in sustainable livestock production?
新研究确定了早期检测胰腺癌的关键蛋白质生物标志物研究使用孟德尔随机化方法将 REG1A 和 REG1B 确定为早期检测胰腺癌的潜在生物标志物，显示它们的因果效应和在癌症筛查中的意义。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240519/New-study-identizes-key- Protein-biomarkers-for-early-detection-of-pancreatic-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240519/New-study-identizes-key- Protein-biomarkers-for-early-detection-of-pancreatic-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=36bc4087-3e96-4fee-a35c-c73d99079227 Sun, 19 May 2024 22:38:00 -0400 New study identifies key protein biomarkers for early detection of pancreatic cancer
基于网络的自助计划被证明可以有效治疗暴食症研究表明，基于网络的认知行为自助干预措施可以有效减少暴食症（BED）患者的暴食事件并改善其整体健康状况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240519/Web-based-self-help-program-proves- effective-in-treating-binge-eating-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240519/Web-based-self-help-program-proves- effective-in-treating-binge-eating-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c654fe85-e1af-4e1f-9ece-d2f570a03a77 Sun, 19 May 2024 22:03:00 -0400 Web-based self-help program proves effective in treating binge eating disorder
